Package entity

Class EnemyShip

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.EnemyShip
public class EnemyShip
extends Entity
Implements a enemy ship, to be destroyed by the player.
Author:
Roberto Izquierdo Amo

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    EnemyShip()
    Constructor, establishes the ship's properties for a special ship, with known starting properties.
    EnemyShip​(int positionX, int positionY, DrawManager.SpriteType spriteType)
    Constructor, establishes the ship's properties.

  • Method Summary

    • EnemyShip

      public EnemyShip​(int positionX, int positionY, DrawManager.SpriteType spriteType)
      Constructor, establishes the ship's properties.
      Parameters:
      positionX - Initial position of the ship in the X axis.
      positionY - Initial position of the ship in the Y axis.
      spriteType - Sprite type, image corresponding to the ship.
